item.title: Garlic Butter Seafood Pasta
item.description: This is a simple outline of how to cook a creamy seafood pasta with white wine butter sauce. ⏲️ Prep time: 20 min Ingredients spaghetti or fettucine butter heavy cream garlic oregano white wine (Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc recommended) lemon/lemon juice (optional) red pepper flakes (optional) seafood, choose from: mussels squid shrimp clams lobster Directions Prepare your pasta, if you don’t know how I recommend to follow these instructions.
